headline: These 3 Gold Miners Could Still Have Massive Upside in 2026
summary: For investors who haven’t been living under a rock for the past year, the soaring price of gold (and other precious metals for that matter) has become one of the most important story lines to watch in the markets this year. With the price of a single ounce of gold now currently hovering around $4,700 ... These 3 Gold Miners Could Still Have Massive Upside in 2026

headline: Gold, Silver Prices Vault to New Highs on U.S.-Europe Tensions
summary: Precious-metal prices rallied to fresh records after President Trump ratcheted up his rhetoric about acquiring Greenland, as his threats of slapping tariffs on several European countries rekindled trade-war fears.  Gold futures hit an intraday all-time high of $4,738 per troy ounce early Tuesday, up more than 3% and on track for a new record settlement.  The metal is seen as a haven asset during times of geopolitical or economic uncertainty.

headline: Gold, Silver Smash Records Amid Hunt for Havens. Trump Fuels a Rally That Will Roll On.
summary: Gold and silver have maintained their meteoric rise in 2026, with prices hitting record highs amid simmering trade tensions between the U.S. and Europe after President Donald Trump threatened eight NATO allies with tariffs unless he is able to acquire Greenland.  Continuous gold futures  rose 3.2% to $4,471.1 and  silver futures  soared 7.4% to hit $95.1.  Tuesday’s gold and silver highs represent a sustained rally that has persisted from 2025, driven by a mix of geopolitical tension and strong investor demand.

raw.headline: Gold, Silver Smash Records Amid Hunt for Havens. Trump Fuels a Rally That Will Roll On.

Tuesday’s gold and silver highs represent a sustained rally that has persisted from 2025, driven by a mix of geopolitical tension and strong investor demand.
